titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Timor
Timor

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The National Archives of Indonesia and Australia are helping the government of Timor-Leste establish its own national archives.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Documents from prior to the independence of Timor-Leste may be found in the Indonesian Archives or the Portuguese National Archives. Additionally, the British Library in London is backing up the materials used in the report of the Commission for Reception, Truth and Reconciliation (CAVR).
